Well, there had been two signs back on Thursday and then again on Monday that the 12-member jury seemed to be deadlocked on every defendant on every count.

And then on Monday the judge gave them something called an Allen charge, which is an instruction to try to come to a resolution, try to reach a verdict, you know, because of all the time, resources and effort that everybody has put into this case.
